Items.Name: lever
Items.Description: a mysterious looking lever that urges to be flipped
Items.InitialDescription: There is a mysterious looking lever that urges to be pulled.

Items.Name: woodenkey
Items.Description: A fragile looking key with cracks all over it
Items.InitialDescription: There is a muddy, slimy, sticky key inside the broken chest.

Items.Name: diamond key
Items.Description: a mysterious looking lever that urges to be flipped
Items.InitialDescription: There is a mysterious looking lever that urges to be flipped

Items.Name: chest
Items.InitialDescription: There is a fragile looking chest that desires to be breaked.

Items.Name: axe
Items.InitialDescription: There is a man standing outside a hut with a axe next to the brazil nut trees. He looks extremely weak and powerless to stop you from stealing his axe.

Items.Name: wood
Items.InitialDescription: You have all this wood, probably enough to build a raft.

Items.Name: redpotion
Items.InitialDescription: The red liquid inside one of the vials bubbles angrily, as if boiling hot.

Items.Name: greenpotion
Items.InitialDescription: The green liquid inside the other vial looks calm and flat, like a refreshing watermelon mocktail.
